page.title: 16A farm near Elton
page.content: My dad works on a family-owned farm. The crops they grow are linseed,rape, barley,maize and corn.Dad mends tractors,shears sheep and injects bullocks with fattening hormones and puts tags in their ears to show they have been injected because it makes them go a bit wild.They keep brown and white Herefords,black and white Friesians,beige Charollais,lighter beige Simmentals and brown with pink ears Belgium Blues.We make silage in spring.The farmer owns 1500 acres where they keep bullocks, sheep and chickens.They send their animals straight to market.The markets they go to are Stamford on Monday,Thrapston and Melton Mowbray on Tuesday and Banbury on Wednesday.Four of the farmer's family work on the farm and three employees.
